title: Federal highway
creator_credit: Michael Healy, British Road Federation and Richard Costain Film Unit
brief_description: A tour of West Germany to inspect the rapidly developing trunk road and urban motorway system. Through the Rhineland from Frankfurt to Cologne, then to Hamburg and Berlin, we see some of the road and bridge works. Aerial views of complex autobahn junctions and intersections which cannot be appreciated from the ground.
